metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0707 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In dma_buf_release of dma-buf.c, there is a possible memory corruption dueto a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withno additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not neededfor exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-155756045References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
